delta:
Sorry — I don’t have access to the time tool in this chat, so I can’t read the current clock directly. (I do see the current date: 2026-02-06.)

If you want, pick one of these and I’ll respond:
- Tell me your timezone or city (e.g., "Europe/Berlin" or "New York") and I’ll give the current local time there.
- Tell me your offset from UTC (e.g., "UTC+2") and I’ll compute the time.
- Allow access to a time tool (if you have one) and I’ll use it.

Which would you prefer?
